meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to lose (something) Usually written using kana alone彼女は新しい時計をなくした。She lost her new watch.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'su' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to get rid of; to eliminate; to remove; to eradicate; to abolish Usually written using kana aloneその国の財政の赤字をなくすには、もっと、たくさんの外国の援助を注ぎ込まなければならなかった。To get the nation's economy out of the red, more foreign aid had to be pumped in.
失くす 【なくす】
失くす: Irregular kanji usage.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to be lost (e.g. luggage); to be missing Usually written using kana aloneあなたの青いペンがなくなってしまいました。I misplaced your blue pen.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to be used up; to be run out; to be exhausted; to be consumed; to be reduced to zero; to not occur any more Usually written using kana alone残り時間があまりなくなってきた。The sands are running out.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to disappear (e.g. pain); to be lost (e.g. a dream, confidence) Usually written using kana aloneやがてこの世から戦争がなくなる日がくるだろう。The day will soon come when there will be no more wars in the world.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Intransitive verb

sentences.translation: The day will soon come when there will be no more wars in the world.

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a prefix
meanings.meaning: 1. absence of permission; lack of permission

meanings.type: Noun, Noun, used as a prefix
meanings.meaning: 2. absence of (advance) notice; lack of notice
1. useless; futile 電気のために、ろうそくは我々の生活にほとんど無用になった。Electricity made candles of little use in our life.
2. unnecessary; needless あせって仕事を仕上げようとすれば、無用な間違いを犯す。When we rush to complete our work, we make needless errors.
3. not on business; unrelated; unauthorised; unauthorized 無用の立ち入り禁止。No admittance except on business.
4. prohibited; banned; forbidden

sentences.translation: Electricity made candles of little use in our life.
When we rush to complete our work, we make needless errors.

1. Mumu

違い無い 【ちがいない】
1. soon; shortly; before long; in a short time; in a little while Usually written using kana aloneまもなくお会いできることを楽しみにしています。I am looking forward to seeing you soon.
2. having no time to ...; with no time to ... after the dictionary form of a verb私は回復する間もなく別のひどい風邪にかかってしまった。I didn't have time to recover before I came down with another horrible cold.
間も無く 【まもなく】

sentences.translation: I am looking forward to seeing you soon.
I didn't have time to recover before I came down with another horrible cold.

meanings.meaning: 1. existence or nonexistence; presence or absence 排卵の有無を調べる方法はありますか？Is there some way to check for ovulation?
2. consent or refusal; yes or no
有無 【ゆうむ】
ゆうむ: Out-dated or obsolete kana usage.

sentences.translation: Is there some way to check for ovulation?
